hero.name: Karine Brito
hero.description_resume: Front-end Developer focused on building high-quality digital interfaces.
hero.description_complete: Hello! My name is Karine, I have a degree in Systems Analysis and Development and I like developing interface design. My interest in software development began in 2020, when I decided to understand the workings behind websites. Because of this, I've found that I can make other people's experience more intuitive.
hero.startup_1: I had the privilege of initially working in a

hero.company_1: Soon after, I worked at a
hero.company_3: where I had the opportunity to improve my softskills and hardskills.
hero.focus: Currently my main focus is studying to develop more accessible and inclusive products.

experience.developer_equals: Front-end Developer | Equals - Gest√£o Financeira Inteligente
experience.description_equals: Responsible for the maintenance and technology migration of a web platform for reconciling sales with credit, debit cards, bank slips and other online payment methods, with the aim of providing practical and intuitive access to the user.
experience.description_weetravel: Responsible for creating and maintaining a web platform for travel agencies, with the aim of offering better internal control management for agencies and automating agents' daily lives.

contact.doubt: If you have any questions or just want to say hi, I'll do my best to get in touch!
